title: Who needs rules?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Moral development in children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conduct of life
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Moral development in children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Moral development in children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Sociological jurisprudence
description: This film shows the wide range of rules of society, from everyday rules to the complex rules of law. Gives two examples: two children decide whether or not to keep a stray dog in an apartment prohibiting animals; and a boy involved in a playground row is torn between the school rule against fighting and his father's order to defend himself. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
